alert.note: Alert for Dickens; Garza; Kent; King; Stonewall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 7:40PM CDT until June 30 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kent County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Dickens County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Garza County in northwestern Texas... Southern King County in northwestern Texas... Stonewall County in northwestern Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 739 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles east of Dickens to 6 miles east of Lake Alan Henry, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Spur, Aspermont, Jayton, Dickens, Guthrie, Lake Alan Henry, Girard, Peacock, Swenson and Clairemont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building until these storms have passed.
